mapper.insert: insert into sys_dept_info (dept_code, dept_name, enter_code, enter_name, super_dept_code, super_dept, dept_mgr, dept_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{superDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{superDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptMgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_dept_info set dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enter_code = #{enterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enter_name = #{enterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, super_dept_code = #{superDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, super_dept = #{superDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_mgr = #{deptMgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_desc = #{deptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dept_code = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select dept_code, dept_name, enter_code, enter_name, super_dept_code, super_dept, dept_mgr, dept_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_dept_info where dept_code = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select dept_code, dept_name, enter_code, enter_name, super_dept_code, super_dept, dept_mgr, dept_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_dept_info

select dept_code, dept_name, enter_code, enter_name, super_dept_code, super_dept, dept_mgr, dept_desc from sys_dept_info where 1=1
and dept_code like '%${deptCode}%'
and dept_name like '%${deptName}%'
and enter_code like '%${enterCode}%'
and enter_name like '%${enterName}%'
and super_dept_code like '%${superDeptCode}%'
and super_dept like '%${superDept}%'
and dept_mgr like '%${deptMgr}%'
and dept_desc like '%${deptDesc}%'
and rec_stat = #{recStat}
select dept_code, dept_name, enter_code, enter_name, super_dept_code, super_dept, dept_mgr, dept_desc from sys_dept_info where super_dept_code = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select dept_code, dept_name, enter_code, enter_name, super_dept_code, super_dept, dept_mgr, dept_desc from sys_dept_info where enter_code = #{enterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by enter_code,super_dept_code,dept_code
